name: net_worth_history_sparklines
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool all_in_one_crypto_swiss_knife.
Tool description: Coins, NFTS, Portfolio tracker, Whales, airdrops, news, tweets, YT videos, reddit posts, DeFi protocols,, games, podcasts, events, gas price and more!
API description: Get sparklines with address net worth for chart rendering.
Returns array of objects with timestamp and USD value

address.description: The cryptocurrency address for which the net worth history is to be fetched.
